website_summaries.verdict: A slim, medium-capacity pitcher suited for a small household that gets the job done.
pros: Many reports that this pitcher raises pH to 9
Its 2.5 liter capacity and compact design saves fridge space
Reasonably priced pitcher with affordable replacement filters
cons: Some consumers also have problems with the handle falling off

customer_reviews.title: 5 Aquafina-6/7 Great value(Walmart water) 5/6 Raised pH lvl slightly not too ...
customer_reviews.text: Changed my bottle water (aquafina& great value aka Walmart water) pH lvl to alkaline around a 9 I ideally filter around 3-4 bottles. now with that being said your water will return to neutral after 2-8 hrs depending how you store it. alkaline water will not stay in that state forever, but a neutral 7 is better than the 5&6 pH lvls before the filter. Now if you want a 9 everytime just filter what you want to drink takes around 2-3 min to get enough for a glass great product
customer_reviews.author: Fuego

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY FROM HERE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unacceptable . I bought two pitchers. Both filters came tampered with and appeared to be used inside a ziplock bag. The smell of the filters were horrible like a wet sock. I never have given a bad review but this really grinded my gears. Horrible and unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Balbontin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I love the Alkaline Water Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I love the Alkaline Water Pitcher :) It fits in my fridge easily and I like the color of the pitcher. The water tastes very clear. I drink about a gallon a day and it has helped me lose weight a lot faster than drinking other types of water (tap or other filtered water products). Since I drink so much water, I have to fill the pitcher up several times a day and it takes about 4 min to have the water filter through the pitcher. I just would have liked it to be slightly bigger so I wouldn't have to keep refilling it as much but other than that it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: calvim

customer_reviews.title: BEST TASTING WATER FROM YOUR KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other water filter pitchers before but this is my first alkaline water pitcher - I'm never going back! This is THE BEST TASTING WATER from my kitchen! It tasted like that expensive water with the pretty tropical mountain landscape in the square bottle. The first full day of drinking water from this pitcher and using it for my morning coffee, I felt so AWAKE :D and happy and I honestly felt like I was getting healthier. I've been drinking a lot more water since I started using this pitcher. And it makes my coffee tastes so much better, richer, and cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Isalina

customer_reviews.title: Ph Level only reads at 8 at best! Lid does not secure well.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this per reviews, but am disappointed. The Ph reading I get is between 7 and 8, no where near 9 as advertised. If you tilt the pitcher to far when pouring the lid falls off and you have a mess, pour design. Also, once the water level of filtered water in the pitcher equals the water level in the "to be" filtered reservoir it levels out and when you pour filtered and unfiltered water mixes together. So, at best you can fill it up to the .75L and not the 1.25L as advertised. If that makes sense. Overall the water tastes great but really it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Container is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This container is not very durable and the top doesn’t fit at all. When you pour water from it the top falls off every time. Also the filter didn’t have the plastic seals on the bottom. My son bought another model from this company and it is a much better container.
customer_reviews.author: Silverslipperdiva

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: So far, seems are working as advertised. The water is quite clean and refreshing -- which is nice, since our local Water Department heavily chlorinates our water, and it is quite hard as well. Of course, this means that filters are used up more quickly than the norm, but it was the same with our PUR pitcher before. I would recommend this to anyone who is in the market for an Alkalizing filter pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Roeder

customer_reviews.title: We really like the ease of use and how fresh the water ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife was instructed she needed to drinking alkaline water for her health, after looking at several high dollar units, magic wands and stuff, we finally settled on this water pitcher. It has turned into our go to water purifier. We really like the ease of use and how fresh the water tastes. Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because I liked the idea of a filter that also alkalized water
customer_reviews.text: This is either poorly made or I got a lemon. The cover of hinged spout kept falling off & it was hardly used. Also it was also awkward pouring water without the entire lid falling off way too easily. Sent it back quickly without bothering to try a replacement. Return handled smoothly. Disappointed because I liked the idea of a filter that also alkalized water.
customer_reviews.author: angelluv

customer_reviews.title: Health Benefits At A Very Reasonable Cost!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reasonably priced way to ensure lots of alkalized water for health concerns - this is it! Purchased this pitcher two months ago due to the (poor) quality of local tap water. I run the tap water through this pitcher, and the result is great tasting alkaline water for drinking, coffee, and cooking for pennies! I was reminded of the value I get when on vacation and needed to purchase alkaline water by the bottle - what sticker shock! You won't be disappointed with your purchase of this economical system.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I called the company and it was replaced with another pitcher that was worst than the first one
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this pitcher is very loose and falls off. It also allows the filter and the non filtered water, which contaminates the alkaline water. I called the company and it was replaced with another pitcher that was worst than the first one. When I called the company they insulted me by telling me that I can call and they will walk me through putting the lid on the pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and not effective
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made and Ph level only slightly more alkaline than tap water. Was far less alkaline than store bought alkaline water. In addition the company gives customers a free filter if they give the product five stars hence the reason the reviews are so good. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Broken lid
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this pitcher because of all the positive reviews. Unfortunately when I received it the lid does not fit properly on the top so every time you pick it up try to use it or refill it fold flips inside the container or tumbles into the sink. It doesn't keep the water inside the filtering tank so if you have a little bit (of unfiltered)left and you're trying to use the ready for that water the unfiltered water will mix with the filtered water as it's coming out
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a decent Alkaline pitcher, water tastes good and appears to do what it’s suppose to do based on other users PH tests. My only gripe with it is once the water level inside the pitcher surpasses the blue tub you fill where the filter is, it doesn’t continue to filter and drain into the pitcher. I often have left over unfiltered water still in the blue section until the water level in the pitcher goes down, which some times ends up in my glass as im pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like it won't last very long
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering with chronic acid reflux and heartburn for about 4-5 months. I read online that alkaline water could give some relief. I was skeptic but willing to try anything to get this feeling to go away. I have used the pitcher for two days and I am already starting to get some relief! Product does exactly what it is supposed to do! Only reason for 4 stars is that it feels a little cheaply made, like it won't last very long, but for $40, it has really helped me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the 2.5 L - get the larger 3.5L size :(
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher works fine, but I was anticipating that I would have 2.5L of treated water to drink at one time. I don't. Due to the size of the filtering mechanism I estimate that I am actually getting approximately 1.25 L of treated water per pour. The design of the filtration mechanism won't allow the remainder of the untreated water in the reservoir to go through the filtration and down into the pitcher until what has already been treated is poured out. I've been using Brita pitchers for years and this is not an issue with them, but it is with the Alkaline Water Pitcher. I'm sorry I didn't purchase the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara DeLong

customer_reviews.title: A few engineering changes needed
customer_reviews.text: 1. Pitcher does its job with a few changes. Lid falls out at 45 degree angle when pouring water. Duck tape lid to pitcher. 2. Filter does not make an adequate seal to housing. Duck tape filter to housing. 3. Spout lid does not open when pouring causing water to spray out in different directions. Duck tape spout permanently open. If new products need an old timer like me to change them so they can work then the engineers ARE NOT doing their job. Neighbor came over to ask what happened to my water filter and I said "nothing, it came broken so I fixed it"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BLAKE Alkaline Water picture
customer_reviews.text: This product registered a 4.5 on the PH test strips that I bought from Amazon by Health Wiser p-h health. The water it filtered has the same PH level of the store bought bottle water that i paid $2.99 for a 24ct case. Most people don't have PH test strips on hand to test PH levels. I would recommend to purchase the test strips and keep them on hand to check the validity of false claims and check if there product is valid, that go's for store bought bottle drinking water. Don't waste your money or time on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely alkalizes
customer_reviews.text: I have a pH tester kit and this certainly makes the water alkaline....Doesn't improve the taste of water...so I don't think that it filters as well as the Culligan or the Brits (which I've used). Is definitely organic...I once left it out and came back to find a colony of ants in the filter...I know it sounds weird but trust me; ants love organic stuff😅
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water pitcher
customer_reviews.text: For years we've had Brita filters, and recently a Clear2) filter. Finally I discovered the Alkaline Water Pitcher by Lake Industries. It is my favorite since it not only filters the water but alkalinizes it as well. It's my favorite looking pitcher as well and so handsome its place is on the kitchen counter instead of hidden in the fridge and since it's not square, it doesn't stick out. It's easy to fill, pours rapidly and the lid stays in place while pouring. All in all it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: HOANA

customer_reviews.title: Great Alkaline Water Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I really love this water pitcher because it has helped make me love water again. Even though the filters go bad quick I still will buy this item before any water pitcher. Drinking one glass of water from this pitcher will transform your health state within a matter of minutes. You will taste the difference and texture of water. GREAT PRODUCT! (Only con is the top lids are flimsy and easy to break, nothing a little scotch tape cant fix.)
customer_reviews.author: Grand Finesse

customer_reviews.title: Even more healthy water.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, water tastes good. I was looking for a reduce acidity in my body and this is a good way to do it. Filter prices are good too. The only thing I don't like about this pitcher is the capacity. once the filtered water level reaches the level of the filter, the water remaining in the unfiltered part easily runs into the container that you are pouring into. A simple lip on the pouring end of the insert would be a great benefit. If it was just me, it would be fine, but if the rest of the family is slugging down water too, it goes quick. Especially when they don't refill the pitcher!
customer_reviews.author: Yurch

customer_reviews.title: It's  ok
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the pitcher is very small. I can fill a 32 oz water bottle and then you have to refill the reservoir. At first, the water was delicious and I was ok with filling up the pitcher each and every time I used it. But a month or so ago, I noted an eggy smell coming from the pitcher. I thought we just needed to change the filter, but even still, that smell has remained. Rather than get another filter for this, I think we will opt for a bigger pitcher with a different filtration system.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Worst made water filter pitcher in the world
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the lid coming off I didn’t see everyone writing it so that’s why I bought this guess what the lid does not even go on correctly. If you are reading this the lid does not stay on at all !!! And I don’t know who Design this. So they think it was OK to sell a defective product.What a waste of my money and next I’m going to listen to those reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Milerzzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, I guess
customer_reviews.text: I love the alkalinity factor. The more I drink alkaline water, the better I feel. However, the workmanship has a lot to be desired. The reservoir shifts as you pour water into your glass. You must then remove the lid and reposition the reservoir so that it fits correctly. Also if you don't hold the lid while pouring, the lid and reservoir will fall out and you will end up with a mess!! Ooops!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul lowman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I think this is still a great product so I decided to buy another one. This time I used the pH drops, instead of the test strips, to test the pH level and it still came out to a 9. The water still stays in the filtration reservoir after the pitcher fills up to about 1L, so I think that the water reservoir needs to be re-designed and raised a bit to allow more water to pass through. Other competitors have this figured out so I'm sure this can be done. I don't have any other issues with this product and I think the water tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much that I had to purchase a ...
customer_reviews.text: My coworker and I originally bought one for our office. Loved it so much that I had to purchase a second one for my home. This does what it says, my water tested at a 9.0. The only thing I would suggest is having larger size as this is too small for my family. I also would suggest that you redesign the reservoir as the water tends to not filter all the way through. Other than that, love that I don't have to but alkaline water anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't give ZERO stars - so I gave it one.
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I have ever purchase. Any reviews that say differently were paid to write them. This product shouldn't even be in production because it does not work. You can't fill the pitcher and the water flows back out of the reservoir before being filtered. Awful design. Do not buy this, you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Change to pH
customer_reviews.text: Tap water went in at pH 8 and came out the same. Because people are curious: I used a calibrated pH meter.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Good for Work
customer_reviews.text: The blue plastic came of the handle first use. The pitcher itself works decently but if you plan on drinking the recommended 8-10 glass of water a day in a house with 3 other people drinking the same amount of water, it is not practical. The pitcher also does. Not fill all the way up with water without you have to pull the blue inner piece out and holding it up the let the water run through the filter, otherwise it takes fooooorreeeeevvvveeeeer for the water to filtrate through. Good for a one person home. Or maybe for work. Not for a home full of people.
customer_reviews.author: Nynally22

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works!! This really makes the water alkaline! I did a test of bottled water, my tap water, my filtered water from the refrigerator and water that was poured from this alkaline water pitcher and the results made a believer out of me! The water from the pitcher took the 6.0 acidic bottled water and made it 8+ alkaline! Whatever water I poured into the pitcher, it came out more alkaline than when it went in!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: could not be more pleased than i am with this product. I was spending a fortune in bottled Alkaline water. the water i get from this little pitcher is better quality and taste so much better than even the bottled water I was buying. My daughter stopped in and took a drink of water from the pitcher and commented how good it tasted. I would purchase again in a heartbeat! I have weak wrist and this is light enough that I can pour water with one hand instead of needing two hands. package arrived on time and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Rocknrobins

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed and thought the reviewer who said the lid falls ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed and thought the reviewer who said the lid falls off was a one-time incident. No. Not only the lid but the blue handle fell off after second use. I will use this as a backup and grumble every time I do.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Alkaline Water Pitcher quality
customer_reviews.text: Both my wide and I loved the pitcher. It is light, and doesn't take much space. The filter produces quick water with pH is about 8.5 from tap 7 at first time use. Water taste is great, no odor and purified. After 30 days of heavy use, the pitcher behaves as first day, pH goes down slightly to 7.75. The average life of the filter is about 2 months when it reaches no pH producing. Bottom line we saved money on both purified water purchase and boiling while enjoying the taste of the the water this pitcher produces. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: T. Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: The filter falls out of place when you try to pour out the last little bit, the lid pops off very easily, and I don't think it tastes great either. It still has a bitter chemical taste. I tried using both filtered and tap water. I would not buy again, and I still buy some bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: thoyman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher performs as described making water definitely alkaline in the 8 -8.5 ph range. The pitcher is rather flimsy and falls apart easily which necessitates constant assembly. If you want to see if alkaline water makes a difference in your life, this is an excellent starter pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Basically doesnt akalize, just filters water
customer_reviews.text: Gets 2 stars because it probabaly filters the water. It doesnt raise the ph more then a fraction of 1. Tried all the tips and tricks. Tried a bunch of cartridges. Wasted $50+ on this. Looking into a counter top alkalizer that actually works. In the mean time i just put tri salts in my water. Sold here on amazon for $8 as an addon item. 1 bottle lasts about 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Borden

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't test the water before or after. I do taste a difference, though. My tap water has a slight chlorine taste but the pitcher does not after filtering. Poor design, feels like lid wants to fall off as I pour so I keep my hand on the top to prevent that from happening. Not sure how the unfiltered water doesn't mix with the filtered water as you pour when there is tap water still in the reservoir. Not impressed, not going to be buying any more filters after I am done with the ones I have. Don't waste your money. Zero stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: 701 😆

customer_reviews.title: The lid falls off when pouring water
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes great Filters are inexpensive Con: Huge- when pouring water, the middle chamber and lid fall out pouring water all over the place. Fix- Scotch tape the lid to the jug. A McGuyver fix that works, but I really should not have to fix a new product
customer_reviews.author: NeoUnity

customer_reviews.title: Great Service! Great Pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: The service department is 5 stars as is the water pitcher. I called the service department because of a defective part on the top part of the pitcher. No problem. A few days later, a new top arrived. I live in Hawaii, and the part was shipped quickly. My water pipes are from 1924. This pitcher changes the foul taste I used to experience into great tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: laurie l connable

customer_reviews.title: The pH level is fine but the lid is driving me nuts
customer_reviews.text: The pH level is fine but the lid is driving me nuts. The lid comes off way too easily. It also only holds a small amount of water at a time so if you drink a lot of water you are constantly filling it up. You might try pouring the water from this pitcher into a gallon container once it has been filtered. Otherwise you'll be constantly filling it up.
customer_reviews.author: serendipity1

customer_reviews.title: I agree the pitch has a por design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I agree the pitch has a poor design flaw. pouring the water the lid comes flying off nearly every time and can run down the side of the pitch bypassing the filter. I read were one customer had the same problem back in 2017. You'd think the design flaw would have been addressed by now in 2019. Plus side, the water tastes great but that doesn't help if we have to mop up the water the every time someone forgets that the top flies off if not help down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually the pitcher is a disappointment. Lid is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Actually the pitcher is a disappointment. Lid is flimsy. Spout doesn't flip back down half the time. It does fit better in the fridge than my old Brita, but seems to be half the quality of the Brita. Now I have 4 extra filters $40 that I doubt my pitcher will get through. I would of sent them back but my 30 days had gone. I do believe that the quality of the water produced is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Good filtering , poor design
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes great. Unfortunately after one week of use the lid started to pop off . Every time I want to pour I haBe to hold the lid on - kind of annoying - especially after only one week of use . Additionally, the the way the pitcher is designed, the water doesn’t stream nicely- it gets everywhere (unless you pour veeeeery slow) . Also wish this came in a dispenser form from that held a greater capacity that you could leave in the fridge so as to not have to refill as frequently .
customer_reviews.author: charisse balance

customer_reviews.title: Very good water from this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Very good water from this pitcher. It seems that 2 people using it after 1,5 month you taste the filter is beginning to be weak but we use it for all water even tea etc. I tried PH strips for urine and seems they are not working for water for some reason, since it showed same PH before and after so i bought PH 10 alkalized water in Sprouts and result was the same so probably PH strips works just for urine or i dont know so im not including this fact as a part of the review if i dont have regular PH meter.
customer_reviews.author: Radek.Pecinka

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the Best Water I ever Tasted!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Water I ever Tasted. Wife was surprised by the taste after she thought my purchase was foolish. The other water pitchers like brita do not taste as good. They are expensive and we steered clear of these but other family members use them. We use to just use the water from the fridge that has been filtered but now the only fridge water we use is just to fill this pitcher!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this product is not great. It does not fill up all the way and the pitcher is already small. Tried replacing it with another one thinking I got a bad one. Turns out it's just how it is . If you drink even a moderate amount of water throughout the day I'd suggest something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is great for filtering out any contaminants from your faucet. The water comes out tasting really refreshing. Filters last approximately two months long. The container itself is pretty small, so it does not take up much room in the fridge. However, since the container is so small, I believe it only holds about ten cups worth of water at a time, with probably half of the water held above the filter. I drink a lot of water a day, so I do have to refill it often. That is the only thing keeping it from a five-star rating in my opinion. All-in-all I am pleased with this purchase and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied disappointed and dissolutioned
customer_reviews.text: Ot is crap. I can't get the top to stay on . It is so cheaply made for the price I'm shoked...no Canada. No as in no please don't make things like China. Cheap with no craftsmanship. Very frustrating especially given how long it took to ship.
customer_reviews.author: gregory bouloukos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent -raised ph much more than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We have extremely acid well water, 4.65. It has always bothered my husband's stomach. Immediately the filter brought the ph to about 5.8. We have been using the pitcher for over a month and I tested again and it was 6.4! The lid stays on very nicely too. It is very easy to use. No problems at all! We love it and are so happy to have stopped using bottled water!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Halley

customer_reviews.title: No change in pH.
customer_reviews.text: After carefully following the instructions - washing the pitcher, running water through the filter for two minutes, filling and discarding three pitchers full of water - we found no change in the pH of our water. The water started at at pH of 6.5 and after filtering it was still 6.5. This is the same result we get with our old Britta water pitcher, which is still working fine. We found no change in pH using this pitcher and filter.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kirchoff

customer_reviews.title: Clean water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pitcher because our water is very hard and has a ton of chlorine. I can tell after using the pitcher that our water is clean and tastes great. The pitcher is small but I didn't have much fridge space so it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: W. Thoma

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This came today completely used with water stains everywhere in an unsealed box and the filter in a ZIPLOC bag with water residue. I am so disgusted and disappointed when I specifically ordered and payed for a new filter and pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware - It's made in China!
customer_reviews.text: Beware...this product is made in China! I was unable to easily find that information prior to purchasing, and had I known...I would absolutely NOT have made this purchase. I believe the promotion of "Lake Industries" as the manufacturer is disingenuous and contributed to my assumption that the pitcher and filter were made in the USA. I should have asked a question, but was in a hurry and didn't adequately do my homework. Hopefully this fact is promoted so future buyers don't have to conduct extensive research to learn the truth that it's a Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Get the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed. Doesn't hold that much water and when pouring water it falls apart. Should of waited for the more expensive one to be on stock.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jones

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I also bought a high quality pH tester and whether I used tap water or filtered refrigerator water, the pH did not increase with the stone provided. I know some people, who, like me, got defective ones contacted them and the company sent them another stone that worked, but I don't usually deal with people who I think intentionally send out defective stuff, figuring few will actually test it, and then send an item that works because they got caught. To me, if there is a doubt that your product works, don't ship it.
customer_reviews.author: William S Monks

customer_reviews.title: Great water
customer_reviews.text: This water tastes amazing and has a very high PH. The container is a little bit poorly designed as the top will fall off easily so we added metal tape to it to keep it on and then no problem. I wish it would fill a bit more water at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Tip: Remove the Round Stickers
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Alkaline Water Pitcher and I'm so excited. When opening the water pitcher you'll notice it's the perfect slender size to fit all fridges. Please note when opening the cartridge that there are two round stickers on the bottom of the filter, remove them or you'll stare at your water pitcher waiting for it to fill for longer than you will like to admit. Overall, I followed the instructions and I'm ready to drink clean Alkaline Water.
customer_reviews.author: Chanthini Butler

customer_reviews.title: No change to alkaline level
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I delayed too long to return it. It is easy to set up, just follow the directions. My ph test strips show no difference between tap water and filtered water. I made sure the water was high enough to touch the filter. I even let it sit and retested after 24 and 48 hours. It did not change the alkaline quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pitcher for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pitcher. I am starting a 10 day cleanse which recommended Alkaline water. That started my search for a pitcher versus buying expensive bottles. I do like that it is slim so I can fit it in the door of my refrigerator. Like others said, the lid and handle are flimsy and will come off. Given the price point of the pitcher, this is not a big deal. This pitcher size would be great for 1-2 persons. If you need it for a large family, I would buy the larger size. Water tastes great and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO SO
customer_reviews.text: IT FITS PERFECTLY IN THE FRIDGE; BUT WHEN YOU GO TO POUR, THE 'WATER ON TOP OF THE FILTER POURS OUT FIRST AND KNOCKS THE LID OFF, SO THE WHOLE THING SPILLS OUT ON THE COUNTER...THE BIG ONE DOESNT DO THAT.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Top broke on first use... but kinda works still
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher, but the spout was broken when it arrived. It still works, but annoying that it broke before pouring out a single glass of water! The water tastes great, but I have to be careful upon pouring or it will spill all over the counter. Hoping to find a way to request a replacement top, without the hassle of having to return the whole thing. I've sent the company an email... stay tuned! Will keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: T2ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my sister in law. I found it very helpful esp during this crisis season. It's really easy to use, water taste great and looks so clean. I have also recommended to my friends, church community and family. I feel am advertising for the company.😁. Honestly thank you for making this product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana A.

customer_reviews.title: Lids don’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first one and it came broken. Returned and second one came and lid would not stay on while pouring water. Which neither kid stayed on. Thought it was because it was broke, but second one wasn’t and it didn’t stay on either. Bad quality. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: The better taste makes it worth it
customer_reviews.text: I do love this pitcher. I just ordered another one, though given our water here, I think the filters need more regular changing. Keep it filled up for maximum impact and make sure you tear the stickers off the bottom of the filter when you change it. I use it for the pet water as well, and they hydrate much better. If it was just for the taste, this pitcher would be worth it, but I also prefer the alkalinity factor for the health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Hero's Head

customer_reviews.title: The water taste good, but the lid has to be taped on ...
customer_reviews.text: The water taste good, but the lid has to be taped on or it just falls off when you pour it and it takes a long time to filter. I also didn't find out until right after I got the product that the filter must be changed pretty often, so keep that in mind. Overall it's a decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chattin

customer_reviews.title: Great filter.  Poor lid and spout.
customer_reviews.text: Filter is great. Hate the lid which only fits if you leave the filter soaking in your filtered water which I do not wish to do. Lid needs to be redesigned. Also full pitcher is difficult to pour into a water bottle without the water spilling all over the place. Spout needs to be redesigned also.
customer_reviews.author: B.DeUgarte

customer_reviews.title: It really tastes good! No charcoal or mineral taste at all
customer_reviews.text: It really tastes good! No charcoal or mineral taste at all. Read the directions, you have to rinse it out several times and shake out the filter before filling it with water. I also forces me to fill the top up as the filter needs to sit in water, so I don't have to wait for it to cool down anymore like when I would drain and refill the gallon I used to use
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted alkaline water but this is not doing it. I have used a water test kit over and over. My tap water is 7 PH. After using this filter it is not quite an 8. I'm very disappointed and don't recommend this. I am looking for a better one. Also the handle came off after 3 weeks. Also the directions don't tell you to take the seals off the bottom but fortunately I read other reviews. Company never answered my email. Caution.
customer_reviews.author: KittyLynn

customer_reviews.title: good pitcher, takes a while to filter the water though
customer_reviews.text: good water pitcher although its not that big in size. once you will the top part it takes a long time to drain to the bottom so when you pour it you will be drinking mixed water, filtered and unfiltered in the same pour.
customer_reviews.author: artoniquenelson@gmail .com

customer_reviews.title: New unit
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today so I haven't tasted the water but I am really excited to have this. We ran water through the unit and filter twice and are doing the third time for our pitcher for the refrige. This is a really nice looking unit. It is quite narrow so will fit in the fridge very nicely. Light weight, nice design. So far very excited to have this as I have been paying $2.00 a bottle for this water and go through it very fast. I will gladly repost when we taste the cold water tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst designed product that I have ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst designed product that I have ever bought from Amazon. Should be totally re-manufactured. Whoever designed it never filled it with water and tried to pour water into it. Luckily I tried using it over the sink. It fell apart and water went everywhere. The top doesn't securely fit into the pitcher. DON'T BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Walmer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this pitcher. The lid is essential ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this pitcher. The lid is essential obviously to keeping the purified and non-purified water from mixing while pouring. I had to send mine back because after just a week and a half of use the lid would no longer seat properly. I've used other pitchers and never seen such a cheaply designed lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as Essentia!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a HUGE and LOYAL fan to Essentia water and because of their brand I've become a health advocate and I'm always educating others on the importance of pure and clean water consumption, most especially Alkaline water! So far I've had the pitcher for two days and allow me to say that the water taste AMAZING! I highly recommend this pitcher to anyone trying to save money and have fresh Alkaline water at home.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: You have to remember to open the pouring spout. ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to remember to open the pouring spout. It does not open by itself when you pour water out of the pitcher. If you don't open the pouring spout the entire top will come off and water will spill all over the place. Otherwise it works well.
customer_reviews.author: hemeinci

customer_reviews.title: The water tastes great, and I love the fact that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just want to say that I am really enjoying my Lake Industries Water Filter and Pitcher. The water tastes great, and I love the fact that it is portable. I plan to take it with me when I leave home to stay out of town because there are many places we go that the water is not palatable. Thank you for the affordable price and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pitcher. My one complaint is that the lid became loose a few times while I was pouring a glass of water. It's not fun having cold water dumped on you, the counter, floor, etc. I tap down on the lid prior to pouring a glass now.
customer_reviews.author: AmyS

customer_reviews.title: Requires two hands to use.
customer_reviews.text: The cover doesn't fit well and is prone to falling off when I try to pour a glass of water. The lip is very fragile and broke off in the first few days. This pitcher takes two hands to operate. One hand to pour and the other to hold the cover and prevent it from coming off and spilling water all over the counter or the floor. Look for another product with a more functional design
customer_reviews.author: Wesley C. Weidemann

customer_reviews.title: Great pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pitcher. I'm living in a region where drinking bottled water is a must, but sometimes the water from the five gallon coolers comes out stale or with an aftertaste; however, after filtering it through this pitcher it taste as clean and as fresh as the pH balance 8.8 water I drank while on vacation in Iceland!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Young

customer_reviews.title: Economical way to Alkalize your water
customer_reviews.text: Very decent Alkaline water filter pitcher. I purchased it to convert Arrowhead water & Body Glove filtered water to alkaline water. It does a very good job, and converts the water quickly. I tested the water before and after filtering it with tester drops I purchased on Amazon. It does what it claims to, increases the Alkalinity. Don't forget to remove the tape on the bottom of the filter! My only wish to make this a better pitcher is if it held more water. I do like that it has a thin profile, which makes it easy to fit in the Fridge.
customer_reviews.author: mfranx

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy that this alkaline water pitcher is available as an alternative to the expensive water ionizers on the market. It works well, and I refill it each time I use it. Sometimes the top will slip down in the back by the handle and the water will drizzle out the back down to the bottom without being filtered, so I am careful to check that it is fitting right before I fill it, and don't overfill it. The water tastes great and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good filter bad fitting lid update
customer_reviews.text: The filter works great at making the water alkaline. I'm taking off two stars for the lid not fitting properly, it doesn't sit flush but at an angle on the picture. When I pour water the comes off. I emailed Lake Industries about the lid not fitting properly and they responded quickly. It turns out I need to put the lid on top of the reservoir first, then put them in the picture. They have a link to a helpful video [...]
customer_reviews.author: Trustnoperson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten one sooner.
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is something that everyone should have in their fridge. I wouldn't trust drinking the tap water in any city I'm in (especially with what's going on in Flint, MI). If you want to think it's not worth having one of these and it's all snake oil, that's on you. But don't complain when you wake up one morning with a fish fin on your head from all the water pollution you've been ingesting.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: Kind of small. It has a basic charcoal filter. When you pour it, the lid can come off. Basically, It's overpriced for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt even filter the chlorine from my tapwater let alone tasting like alkaline water. very disappointed. I now love my Britta more.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't feel like a quality container for what I was buying
customer_reviews.text: I feel the product material (plastic) is very thin and the inside container (blue) was leaking around the edges when it poured. Having said that, I am accustomed to the Brita water filter which is much stronger and solid feeling. Honestly, I felt like this container was of a lesser quality and for the money that was paid, I feel it should have been of better quality. It felt cheap. I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T,

customer_reviews.title: pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.text: The water has a great taste and eliminates my need to purchase alkaline water every other day and lug the heavy bottles home which accumulate horribly! I did not like that the pitcher doesn't hold enough water that's filtered and that the top comes off very easily! I do like the narrow design and the convenience of having alkaline filtered water always in my home and refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t close
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor but the lid doesn’t close completely so every time I go to pour water it comes out. I have to secure it with rubber bands to keep it in place
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: CRACKED WASTE OF MONEY !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible . waited 4 days to get it only to open it , mind you I was like a child on Christmas when it arrived only to see that it was cracked all the way from the top down to the bottom . cont. Less than poor . I give it a whopping 1 star review . lastly it is much smaller than pictures, its tiny !!! So in sort goto Wal-Mart buy a damn Brita instead . at least then you have it and you know what you are buying. You won't have to waste your time going to the post office that you do live near to send it back . !!!
customer_reviews.author: boppa

customer_reviews.title: Never had a chance to try the pitcher since the ...
customer_reviews.text: Never had a chance to try the pitcher since the inside water filter holder was broken when it arrived. It had to have been assembled and shipped in that condition since there is no way to have shattered the holder while inside the pitcher without having damaged the entire pitcher. The pitcher itself is poorly designed since it is not possible to flip open the filling lid. The way it is designed, the hinge on the fill lid hangs up on the pitcher such that the lid can't be opened. In order to fill the pitcher, the entire pitcher cover would have to be removed.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great filtration system
customer_reviews.text: Great filtration system. Product does have flaws it won't fill past 1 liter unless you manually allow it to drip by riding the inner resivior !
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Faster and more compact than my previous filter pitcher.
customer_reviews.text: Faster than my Brita. The pH of my water goes up like it's supposed to, the water tastes good and it seems to do what it says it's going to do. I don't know how to tell objectively if it's filtering as well as it says but it seems to. The pitcher is well made and I like the shape as it takes up less space side to side than my Brita did.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars (I think it's a great product for the price); however, I personally am not a fan of the common design associated with these type of filters: I've found that it's easier and better to take the entire plastic blue filter compartment out (I've made a cover for it with a hole so that I can sit the filter on top of the pitcher, fill it a few times, and end up with a full pitcher. If they designed the top so that the filter compartment could sit on top of the pitcher securely while you fill it, I'd like the product much better. It's working,...,.it's just that the design could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Well built? I Don't think so!
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work very well. (If it doesn't fall apart). Not impressed with the construction of it. The filter housing insert does not fit properly an the lid will not stay on, it's tends to fall off as you pour quite often. I haven't found one that filters as good, so....I'll have get out the duct tape i guess.
customer_reviews.author: budha

customer_reviews.title: SCAM- piece of garbage- GET YOUR REFUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed, water didn't taste good and the pitcher is Chinese manufacturing at its worst. Lid does not stay on when you pour the water. I'm not alone, read all the other 1 star reviews. So sad that Amazon lets you think it's great by the stats, the company asks you to rate it before you even register it. BOO ALKALINE WATER PITCHER COMPANY!!!!! CREEPS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Little

customer_reviews.title: Good quality water
customer_reviews.text: This product is decent; the main issue is that some water stays unfiltered unless it's at the perfect level. I just bought a PH tester and haven't tested it yet, but the water tastes better than most filtered water and I feel great when I drink it. Definitely recommend this product and I will update the review when I receive the PH tester.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi N King

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone says, the lid falls off. That's annoying, but not deal breaking. What is is that it raises my water's ph by less than 0.7, from 7.11 to 7.80. That's not significant. It may be that my filter is defective, looked like charcoal came out of it during the initial bit of running it under water for a few mins. Also have fully filled it like other people suggested, no help.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with gout and one of my experiments is to stop drinking purified, acidic water and instead drinking purified, alkaline water. The jury is still out on that but I do believe the water from this pitcher is alkaline. The ph strip test sort of indicated this, and my other experiment - taking water with apple cider vinegar - tastes like the acidic vinegar has been neutralized with this alkaline water unlike when I use other purified water. I'm very happy with this purchase. I'm also leaving this review to get a free replacement cartridge, which I will gratefully accept.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Shen

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn water Alkaline.
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of having a pitcher that filtered water and made it alkaline. However, the case is just not that. The water that came out of my fridge was more alkaline before it went through the filter. The alkalinity went down to a 6.1 - 6.2 which is more acidic than alkaline. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christina Alexandra Leisge

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions in the box.
customer_reviews.text: At 1st I wasn't very pleased that the lid kept coming loose and spilling water. I went to the website and viewed the unboxing video and learned that the lid was made to fit on the reservoir not the pitcher and the problem was solved. That info should be included with the picture and many bad reviews could be avoided. I really like the taste of my water now. I didn't realize how bad it tasted before.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hatheway

product_meta.title: Lake Industries7000 Alkaline Water Filter Pitcher, 7-Stage Cartridge Composed of Ion Exchange Resin, Tourmaline, Mineral Balls and Carbon, Removes Free-Radicals and Eliminates Toxins, 2.5 Liters
feature_bullets: 7 STAGE FILTER CARTRIDGE of Ion Exchange Resin, Tourmaline, Mineral Balls, and Carbon. All combine to purify - removing chlorine, odors, heavy metals. 1 CARTRIDGE INCLUDED.....Be sure to remove shipping stickers from bottom of cartridge when first received.

ECONOMICAL and ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - Premium (BPA FREE) Food Grade, strong, rigid and recyclable AS/ABS plastic - reduces the need for plastic bottles. Suggested to change filter every 2 months or 150 liters/40 gallons.

UNIQUE DESIGN - Slim pitcher easily fits in any refrigerator. Easy-to-fill lid designed to allow you to fill the reservoir without removing the cover. Easy pour spout ensures the perfect pour with no mess! Ergonomic handle for comfort during use.

REMOVES FREE-RADICALS AND ELIMINATES TOXINS with powerful Antioxidants, and High Negative ORP (Oxidation-Reduction Potential is a measurement to oxidize contaminants) - Increases energy levels and strengthens immune system. Removes 90% of all zinc, copper, lead and pollutants to create an amazingly delicious alkaline beverage.

IMPROVE HYDRATION with MICRO-CLUSTERED MOLECULES - Allow your body to easily absorb water more easily with micro-clustering (reduces water molecule size naturally through contact with naturals stones and ceramics contained in the cartridge).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,773 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
